titleStmt.title: An answer to Mr. Henry Payne's letter concerning His Majesty's declaration of indulgence, writ to the author of the Letter to a dissenter
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Signed: T.T. [i.e. Gilbert Burnet]. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
